verses.plain: A false balance is abomination to the LORD: but a just weight is his delight.

tokens.t: A false balance
abomination to the
: but a just weight
his delight.

verses.plain: When pride cometh, then cometh shame: but with the lowly is wisdom.

tokens.t: pride cometh, then cometh shame: but with the lowly
wisdom.

verses.plain: The integrity of the upright shall guide them: but the perverseness of transgressors shall destroy them.

tokens.t: The integrity of the upright shall guide them: but the perverseness of transgressors shall destroy them.

verses.plain: Riches profit not in the day of wrath: but righteousness delivereth from death.

tokens.t: Riches profit not in the day of wrath: but righteousness delivereth from death.

verses.plain: The righteousness of the perfect shall direct his way: but the wicked shall fall by his own wickedness.

tokens.t: The righteousness of the perfect shall direct his way: but the wicked shall fall by his own wickedness.

verses.plain: The righteousness of the upright shall deliver them: but transgressors shall be taken in their own naughtiness.

tokens.t: The righteousness of the upright shall deliver them: but transgressors shall be taken in
naughtiness.

verses.plain: When a wicked man dieth, his expectation shall perish: and the hope of unjust men perisheth.

tokens.t: When a wicked man dieth,
expectation shall perish: and the hope of unjust
perisheth.

verses.plain: The righteous is delivered out of trouble, and the wicked cometh in his stead.

tokens.t: The righteous is delivered out of trouble, and the wicked cometh in his stead.

verses.plain: An hypocrite with his mouth destroyeth his neighbour: but through knowledge shall the just be delivered.

tokens.t: An hypocrite with
mouth destroyeth his neighbour: but through knowledge shall the just be delivered.

verses.plain: When it goeth well with the righteous, the city rejoiceth: and when the wicked perish, there is shouting.

tokens.t: When it goeth well with the righteous, the city rejoiceth: and when the wicked perish,
shouting.

verses.plain: By the blessing of the upright the city is exalted: but it is overthrown by the mouth of the wicked.

tokens.t: By the blessing of the upright the city is exalted: but it is overthrown by the mouth of the wicked.

verses.plain: He that is void of wisdom despiseth his neighbour: but a man of understanding holdeth his peace.

tokens.t: He that is void of wisdom despiseth his neighbour: but a man of understanding holdeth his peace.

verses.plain: A talebearer revealeth secrets: but he that is of a faithful spirit concealeth the matter.

tokens.t: A talebearer revealeth secrets: but he that is of a faithful spirit concealeth the matter.

verses.plain: Where no counsel is, the people fall: but in the multitude of counsellors there is safety.

tokens.t: Where no counsel
, the people fall: but in the multitude of counsellors
safety.

verses.plain: He that is surety for a stranger shall smart for it: and he that hateth suretiship is sure.

tokens.t: He that is surety for a stranger shall smart
and he that hateth suretiship is sure.

verses.plain: A gracious woman retaineth honour: and strong men retain riches.

tokens.t: A gracious woman retaineth honour: and strong
retain riches.

verses.plain: The merciful man doeth good to his own soul: but he that is cruel troubleth his own flesh.

tokens.t: The merciful man doeth good to his own soul: but
cruel troubleth his own flesh.

verses.plain: The wicked worketh a deceitful work: but to him that soweth righteousness shall be a sure reward.

tokens.t: The wicked worketh a deceitful work: but to him that soweth righteousness
a sure reward.

verses.plain: As righteousness tendeth to life: so he that pursueth evil pursueth it to his own death.

tokens.t: As righteousness
to life: so he that pursueth evil
to his own death.

verses.plain: They that are of a froward heart are abomination to the LORD: but such as are upright in their way are his delight.

tokens.t: They that are of a froward heart
abomination to the
: but
upright in
way
his delight.

verses.plain: Though hand join in hand, the wicked shall not be unpunished: but the seed of the righteous shall be delivered.

tokens.t: hand
in hand, the wicked shall not be unpunished: but the seed of the righteous shall be delivered.

verses.plain: As a jewel of gold in a swine’s snout, so is a fair woman which is without discretion.

tokens.t: a jewel of gold in a swine’s snout,
a fair woman which is without discretion.

verses.plain: The desire of the righteous is only good: but the expectation of the wicked is wrath.

tokens.t: The desire of the righteous
only good:
the expectation of the wicked
wrath.

verses.plain: There is that scattereth, and yet increaseth; and there is that withholdeth more than is meet, but it tendeth to poverty.

tokens.t: There is that scattereth, and yet increaseth; and
that withholdeth more than is meet, but
to poverty.

verses.plain: The liberal soul shall be made fat: and he that watereth shall be watered also himself.

tokens.t: The liberal soul shall be made fat: and he that watereth shall be watered also himself.

verses.plain: He that withholdeth corn, the people shall curse him: but blessing shall be upon the head of him that selleth it.

tokens.t: He that withholdeth corn, the people shall curse him: but blessing
upon the head of him that selleth

verses.plain: He that diligently seeketh good procureth favour: but he that seeketh mischief, it shall come unto him.

tokens.t: He that diligently seeketh good procureth favour: but he that seeketh mischief, it shall come unto him.

verses.plain: He that trusteth in his riches shall fall: but the righteous shall flourish as a branch.

tokens.t: He that trusteth in his riches shall fall: but the righteous shall flourish as a branch.

verses.plain: He that troubleth his own house shall inherit the wind: and the fool shall be servant to the wise of heart.

tokens.t: He that troubleth his own house shall inherit the wind: and the fool
servant to the wise of heart.

verses.plain: The fruit of the righteous is a tree of life; and he that winneth souls is wise.

tokens.t: The fruit of the righteous
a tree of life; and he that winneth souls
wise.

verses.plain: Behold, the righteous shall be recompensed in the earth: much more the wicked and the sinner.

tokens.t: Behold, the righteous shall be recompensed in the earth: much more the wicked and the sinner.

footnotes.text: A false…: Heb. Balances of deceit
A talebearer: Heb. He that walketh, being a talebearer
suretiship: Heb. those that strike hands
